author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Gujarat Assembly witnessed uproar and heated altercations between the ruling party and Opposition members on Tuesday over illegal liquor dens and Patidar reservation issues that led to the suspension of the entire Opposition from the house for a day.

During discussion on the Governor’s address, Congress MLA Kamini Rathod alleged that the government had turned a blind eye to the illegal liquor dens despite prohibition in the State.

The altercation between Ms. Rathod and Mr. Patel led to the Opposition members rushing to the well of the House.

Eventually, the entire Opposition was suspended from the House for the day.
title: Ruckus in Gujarat House over hooch trade
